TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 启用托管代码以处理用于指示损坏的进程状态的异常。

span.span: Enables managed code to handle exceptions that indicate a corrupted process state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 损坏的进程状态异常是指示进程状态已损坏的异常。Corrupted process state exceptions are exceptions that indicate that the state of a process has been corrupted. 建议不要在此状态下执行应用程序。We do not recommend executing your application in this state. 默认情况下, 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 不会将这些异常传递给托管代码, `try` / `catch`也不会为它们调用块 (以及其他异常处理子句)。By default, the common language runtime (CLR) does not deliver these exceptions to managed code, and the `try`/`catch` blocks (and other exception-handling clauses) are not invoked for them. 如果你完全确信要保持对这些异常的处理, 则必须将属性应用于要执行的异常处理子句的方法。If you are absolutely sure that you want to maintain your handling of these exceptions, you must apply the attribute to the method whose exception-handling clauses you want to execute. CLR 仅在同时具有和属性的方法中, 将损坏的进程状态异常传递给适用的异常子句。The CLR delivers the corrupted process state exception to applicable exception clauses only in methods that have both the and attributes. 还可以将[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/legacycorruptedstateexceptionspolicy-element.md)元素添加到应用程序的配置文件中。You can also add the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/legacycorruptedstateexceptionspolicy-element.md) element to your application's configuration file. 这将确保在没有或 属性的情况下, 将损坏状态异常传递给异常处理程序。This will ensure that corrupted state exceptions are delivered to your exception handlers without the or attribute. 此配置元素对于在之前的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]版本中编译但在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或更高版本中运行的应用程序不起作用; 将继续为这些应用程序提供损坏状态异常。This configuration element has no effect on applications that were compiled in versions previous to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] but are running in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or later; corrupted state exceptions will continue to be delivered for those applications. 当在部分受信任的或透明的代码中遇到此属性时, 该属性将被忽略, 因为受信任的主机不允许不受信任的外接程序捕获和忽略这些严重异常。The attribute is ignored when it is encountered in partially trusted or transparent code, because a trusted host should not allow an untrusted add-in to catch and ignore these serious exceptions. 有关损坏的进程状态异常的详细信息, 请参阅博客中的 CLR 内部的[处理损坏状态异常](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=179681)的条目。For more information about corrupted process state exceptions, see the entry [Handling Corrupted State Exceptions](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=179681) in the CLR Inside Out blog.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
